title: Sci-Fi - Volume 1
description: 10 sci-fi/space themes for RPG, futuristic and space adventures with multiple loops, shorter edits and stings
longDescription:
Preview the collection:

  • YouTube


"Sci-Fi - Volume 1" is a collection of synth based space ambient themes featuring multiple loops, shorter edits and stings.

Ranging from emotional moods to ethereal vibes, this collection is suitable for RPG, futuristic survivals, space adventures and many more.


  • So Far So Close: Full length (03:18), 3 Short edits, 7 Loops
  • Desolation Bowls: Full length (01:31), 2 Short edits, 5 Loops, 1 Sting
  • Countdown To Space: Full length (03:58), 5 Short edits, 14 Loops, 1 Sting
  • Elysium Fields: Full length (02:41), 2 Short edits, 6 Loops
  • Lunar Wind: Full length (03:00), 2 Short edits, 5 Loops
  • Tongue Drums From Space: Full length (02:42), 2 Short edits, 5 Loops
  • Tongue Drums From Space (No Vocals): Full length (02:42), 2 Short edits, 5 Loops
  • Approaching The Dock: Full length (02:24), 1 Short edit, 7 Loops, 1 Sting
  • Mare Tranquillitatis: Full length (02:30), 1 Short edit, 5 Loops
  • Omega: Full length (02:00), 2 Short edits, 6 Loops, 1 Sting
  • Life And Death: Full length (03:22), 1 Short edit, 7 Loops, 1 Sting



Take a look: Total Game Music Collection - 500 High Quality music themes ideal for any game!

Maybe you might be interested at "Sci-Fi - Volume 2" or Space Ambient Vol.1


This pack is produced by Luca Tomassini a composer with more than 20 years of expertise in music production with multiple TV, feature films and multimedia placements.Â
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 10 Full length tracks (+1 Alternative edit)
  • 37 Short edits
  • 58 Loops
  • 5 Stings

Number of Audio Wavs: 111

Number of Audio Cues: 111

Sample Rate/Bit Rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs

Does Music Loop: Yes

Minutes of Audio Provided: 113:12

Supported Development Platforms: All

Supported Target Build Platforms: All


- Terms of Usage and Licensing Notes outside the game engine.

All packages by Frequently Asked Music are meant to be used within Unreal Engine. Please contact us at studio@frequentlyaskedmusic.com for further clearance in case you want to use a specific track for other purposes - YouTube videos, social marketing, promo.
